overview:
Santosh S Lad Kalkatgi, age 33, a commerce graduate, who has been bestowed with multiple traits is an avaricious traveler and down to earth person. His dynamism, enthusiasm and leadership qualities are chief contributions to the diversification and growth of LAD’s Technologies (a gamut of management talent).

He is currently a Member of Legislative Assembly and a very active politician. His traits keys out his persona. He believes, ” Efforts leads to achievement, but learning and growing from achievements and give back in the form of service leads to satisfaction in them”.

external_links.title: 600 couples tie knot at mass marriage
